releases.description: The http layer is now fully managed, future advancement will be configurable customisation of the http layer.
changes: [manual change required] nodegenDir in the .nodegenrc file now has value 'src/http'
[manual change required] app.ts now only calls @/src/http, see the latest in github for how it should now look
[manual change required] server.ts now must call the start() function returned in the app.ts
